sentences.sContent: Or better yet, take a vacation. Just the two of you.
sentences.sContent_eng: Or better yet, take a vacation. Just the two of you.
sentences.sCn: 或者更好的办法是去度假，就你们两个。

sentences.sContent: I'm going to take a vacation next month.I wonder you whether plan or not. If not, maybe you are willing to go with me.
sentences.sContent_eng: I'm going to take a vacation next month.I wonder you whether plan or not. If not, maybe you are willing to go with me.
sentences.sCn: 我打算下个月去度假，不知道你是否已经做好度假计划，如果还没有，或许你愿意和我一起去度假。

sentences.sContent: A: I’m going to take a vacation next month. I don’t know whether you have got any plans for the holiday, if not, maybe you would like to go with me.
sentences.sContent_eng: A: I’m going to take a vacation next month. I don’t know whether you have got any plans for the holiday, if not, maybe you would like to go with me.
sentences.sCn: 我打算下个月去度假，不知道你是否已经做好度假计划，如果还没有，或许你愿意和我一起去度假。
